label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added dnsendpoint CRD to the Helm chart.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug to support recognizing short and long IPv6 addresses as equal.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added a feature to allow WebhookProvider to return a SoftError for response status codes greater than or equal to 500.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added a zone name filter for Azure Private DNS.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed syntax issue on Cloudflare ExternalDNS.

label: kind/feature
impact/high
notes.text: Added support for the AWS ca-west-1 region.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added IPv6 AAAA record support to the PiHole provider.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a soft error handling issue for Cloudflare rate limits.
